## Source: ossf-package-analysis (682294875aa887eef558537e7bed5081265058ed0c4f8a0a36179801262700ce)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'mattermost-cloudnative-bootstrapper' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
